message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less.  Would you be willing to go down to $105?
I can do a bit better than that, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $107.50. Is that something you'd be interested in?
